entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
